title: Tips
description: The Tips feature provides helpful and contextual guidance to users, promoting efficient use of the application and familiarizing them with key functionalities.
acceptance_criteria: The Tips feature displays a brief, informative message to the user, highlighting a specific functionality or shortcut.
Tips are presented in a non-intrusive way, typically as a small popup or overlay.
Tips are displayed as per the policy or guidelines set by the application owner.
Users can dismiss the Tips message by clicking on a designated button or by closing the popup.
Tips are dynamically triggered based on user actions or the current state of the application.
Tips are contextually relevant, providing guidance that aligns with the user's current activity.
